ded0fdab-a0a3-4e42-ac04-37e484c6cced.description: The introductory badge earner can demonstrate basic knowledge of key concepts in Quantum Information Science, identify how quantum impacts different industries and our lives, and explore what the education and career pathways are in quantum and how they relate to your interests.
ded0fdab-a0a3-4e42-ac04-37e484c6cced.name: Pathways to Quantum: Discovery for Students

issuer.summary: issued by Potomac Quantum Innovation Center (PQIC)

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge participated in a virtual course where they were provided with material to develop a foundational understanding of the quantum field. Earners explored examples of quantum theory, and its applications in the real world and are exposed to the educational and career pathways into the quantum field. The earner must complete and pass an online test.

507a9031-215b-4844-ad86-f4ebce40fa16.description: The Pioneer Badge earner built upon the Introductory Badge and identified a current issue or technology that can be addressed or improved through quantum innovations. The earner researched and created a poster presentation showcased at the 2022 Quantum World Congress in Washington, D.C.
507a9031-215b-4844-ad86-f4ebce40fa16.name: Pathways to Quantum: Explorer for Students

issuer.summary: issued by Potomac Quantum Innovation Center (PQIC)

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge completed a virtual course and earned the 'Discovery for Students’ credential. Building on that knowledge, the earner completed a poster presentation project identifying a current issue or technology that can be addressed or improved through quantum. Earners researched the topics, envisioning what it might look like in 10 or more years, and describing the breakthroughs needed. The posters were presented at the 2022 Quantum World Congress in Washington, D.C.

b14c634e-a16a-498a-8d08-744f8b8d2b8b.description: Accredited to Speakers at the Quantum World Congress 2022 held in Washington D.C. The Quantum World Congress 2022 is the first-ever gathering of its kind – connecting the world’s quantum ecosystem, including the brightest researchers, innovators, technology developers, legislators, and industry experts – to accelerate the value of the growing quantum industry. Quantum World Congress is organized by Connected DMV's Potomac Quantum Innovation Center initiative.
b14c634e-a16a-498a-8d08-744f8b8d2b8b.name: Quantum World Congress Speaker 2022

issuer.summary: issued by Potomac Quantum Innovation Center (PQIC)

badge_template_activities.title: This credential is awarded to speakers at the Quantum World Congress 2022. Speakers presented cross-sector and cross-domain material through presentations, panels, and fireside chats.

c4a880b3-f793-4f7a-8180-568a1c73b12e.description: Accredited to the 1st-Runner-Up of the Quantum Startup Pitch Competition at the Quantum World Congress 2022 held in Washington D.C. The Quantum World Congress 2022 is the first-ever gathering of its kind – connecting the world’s quantum ecosystem, including the brightest researchers, innovators, technology developers, legislators, and industry experts – to accelerate the value of the growing quantum industry.
c4a880b3-f793-4f7a-8180-568a1c73b12e.name: Quantum World Congress 2022 - Pitch Competition Second Place

issuer.summary: issued by Potomac Quantum Innovation Center (PQIC)

badge_template_activities.title: This credential is awarded to the 1st-Runner-Up Startup of the Quantum Startup Pitch Competition at the Quantum World Congress 2022. Presenters pitched against 5 other finalists to a panel of industry experts. The 2022 competition focussed on life sciences, biotech, and healthcare.

19894e49-452e-4029-a119-a6e178357b6c.description: Accredited to the 2nd-Runner-Up of the Quantum Startup Pitch Competition at the Quantum World Congress 2022 held in Washington D.C. The Quantum World Congress 2022 is the first-ever gathering of its kind – connecting the world’s quantum ecosystem, including the brightest researchers, innovators, technology developers, legislators, and industry experts – to accelerate the value of the growing quantum industry.
19894e49-452e-4029-a119-a6e178357b6c.name: Quantum World Congress 2022 - Pitch Competition Third Place

issuer.summary: issued by Potomac Quantum Innovation Center (PQIC)

badge_template_activities.title: This credential is awarded to the 2nd-Runner-Up of the Quantum Startup Pitch Competition at the Quantum World Congress 2022. Presenters pitched against 5 other finalists to a panel of industry experts. The 2022 competition focussed on life sciences, biotech, and healthcare.

The Quantum World Congress 2022 is the first-ever gathering of its kind – connecting the world’s quantum ecosystem, including the brightest researchers, innovators, technology developers, legislators, and industry experts – to accelerate the value of the growing quantum industry.
